message.name: ERR_CHUNKS_SKIPPED
message.locale: WARNING: %1n chunks of data were not processed by this batch program, tax slips for up to %2n Concern Roles will not have been processed.

message.name: INF_RECORDS_PROCESSED
message.locale: Total number of Concern Role Tax Slips processed: %1n

message.name: INF_RECORDS_SKIPPED
message.locale: Total number of Concern Role Tax Slips skipped: %1n

message.name: INF_GEN_ORIG_TAX_SLIP_BATCH_SUB
message.locale: Report from Generate Original Tax Slips batch job run on %1s.

message.name: INF_GEN_AMENDED_TAX_SLIP_BATCH_SUB
message.locale: Report from Generate Amended Tax Slips batch job run on %1s.

message.name: ERR_SEED_OUT_OF_RANGE
message.locale: No Seeds available. Current max Seed value is %1d. Seeds between range %2d and %3d are allowed only.
